titleStmt.title: God's goodness to this Israel in all ages being the substance of some sermons on Psalm LXXIII, I/ by J.F., minister of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: J. F. (James Forbs), 1629?-1712.

notesStmt.note: "Truly God is good to Israel, even to such as are of a clean heart."
Imperfect : pages torn. Title page-page 11 from Harvard copy spliced at end.
Errata : p. [2] on Harvard copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
